attributes.action: Provide public recycling bins near to standard rubbish bins.
attributes.additional_details: Home recycling wheely bins are a good start but most people will not take recycling home with them when out and about. I currently practise this but far too many people will just throw it in with regular rubbish.
attributes.background: To put to vote whether or not it is viable to also provide public recycling bins or stations to throw away waste instead of it all being put into rubbish bins to go to tip.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for local authorities. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
